quest: Only Scotland and Northern Ireland have their patron saint's day as an official holiday
quest_zh: 只有蘇格蘭和北愛爾蘭作為正式假期的守護神日

quest: Boxing Day is the day before Christmas Day and is a public holiday.
quest_zh: 節禮日是聖誕節前一天，是一個公共假期。

quest: Father's Day is the second Sunday in June. Children send cards or buy gifts for their fathers.
quest_zh: 父親節是六月的第二個星期日。孩子們為父親發送卡片或購買禮物。

quest: The UK has hosted the Olympic Games on two occasions
quest_zh: 英國曾兩次舉辦奧運會

quest: Rugby originated in England in the early 19th century and is very popular in the UK today.
quest_zh: 橄欖球起源於19世紀初的英格蘭，今天在英國非常受歡迎。

quest: A British sailor, Sir Francis Chichester, was the first person to sail single-handed around the world
quest_zh: 英國水手弗朗西斯·奇切斯特爵士是第一個在世界各地航行的人

quest: The Proms is an four-week summer season of orchestral classical music
quest_zh: 舞會是一個為期四周的管弦樂古典音樂的夏季

quest: The Mercury Music Prize is awarded each September for the best album from the UK and Ireland.
quest_zh: 每年9月，獲得英國和愛爾蘭的最佳專輯。

quest: The Turner Prize was established in 2004 and celebrates contemporary art.
quest_zh: 特納獎成立於2004年，並慶祝當代藝術。

quest: Ulster Fry is a welsh traditional food
quest_zh: 阿爾斯特·弗萊（Ulster Fry）是威爾士傳統食物

quest: Films were first shown publicly in the UK in 1896
quest_zh: 電影於1896年首次在英國公開放映

quest: The ability to laugh at other people is an important part of the UK character
quest_zh: 嘲笑他人的能力是英國角色的重要組成部分

quest: Blind people can get a 50% discount on their TV licence
quest_zh: 盲人可以在電視執照上獲得50％的折扣

quest: Pubs are usually open during the day from 11.00 am (12 noon on Sundays)
quest_zh: 酒吧通常在白天從上午11.00（週日中午12點）開放

quest: People under 18 are not allowed to participate in the National Lottery.
quest_zh: 18歲以下的人不允許參加國家彩票。

quest: All dogs in public places must wear a collar showing the name and address of the owner
quest_zh: 公共場所的所有狗都必須佩戴衣領，顯示所有者的名稱和地址

quest: The Lake District is England's largest national park
quest_zh: 湖區是英格蘭最大的國家公園

quest: The UK is a parliamentary democracy with the monarch as head of state.
quest_zh: 英國是君主作為國家元首的議會民主國家。

quest: In the 1830s and 1840s, a group called the Chartists campaigned for every woman to have a vote
quest_zh: 在1830年代和1840年代，一個名為Chartists的小組競選每個女人進行投票

quest: In 2010 Queen Elizabeth II celebrated her Diamond Jubilee (50 years as queen)
quest_zh: 2010年，伊麗莎白二世皇后慶祝了她的鑽石禧年（50歲時擔任女王）

quest: The first verse of the UK National Anthem begins with 'God save the Queen'
quest_zh: 英國國歌的第一節經文始於“上帝拯救女王”

quest: Voters in each constituency elect their member of Parliament (MP) in a General Election.
quest_zh: 每個選區的選民在大選中選舉其議會議員（MP）。

quest: Peers (Sitting in the House of Lords) inherit their titles now
quest_zh: 同齡人（坐在上議院中）現在繼承了他們的頭銜

quest: Debates in the House of Commons are chaired by the Prime Minister.
quest_zh: 下議院的辯論由總理主持。

quest: If an MP dies or resigns, there will be a fresh General election
quest_zh: 如果國會議員去世或辭職，將舉行新的大選
